meanings.definition: Relating to the branch of philosophy that deals with the nature of reality.
meanings.sent1: Studying metaphysical ideas helps us understand the world better.
meanings.sent2: The professor's metaphysical explanation of existence was fascinating.
meanings.sent3: I never thought discussing metaphysical concepts could be so interesting!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a metaphysical puzzle, full of deep thoughts and questions.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted a metaphysical picture of beauty across the sky.

meanings.definition: Existing outside of the physical world.
meanings.sent1: Ghosts are often described as metaphysical beings.
meanings.sent2: The idea of a parallel metaphysical realm is intriguing.
meanings.sent3: It's hard to believe in metaphysical creatures like unicorns!
meanings.sent4: Her love for him felt metaphysical, transcending mere physical attraction.
meanings.sent5: The dream felt so real, yet it had a metaphysical quality to it.

meanings.definition: Concerned with abstract or spiritual concepts.
meanings.sent1: The poet's metaphysical verses touched the hearts of many.
meanings.sent2: She found solace in the metaphysical teachings of the ancient texts.
meanings.sent3: Discussing metaphysical topics always leads to deep conversations.
meanings.sent4: His metaphysical beliefs guided him through difficult times.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the essence of her metaphysical journey.
